powerRating.description: measure of power a resistor can dissipate indefinitely without degrading performance

temperatureCoefficient.description: change in resistance when the temperature is changed

maxOverloadVoltage.description: maximum voltage that can be applied to the resistor for a short period of time

maxLimitingElementVoltage.description: maximum voltage value that can be applied continuously to the resistor

minTemperature.description: minimum temperature under which a resistor can be expected to reliably operate

maxTemperature.description: maximum temperature under which a resistor can be expected to reliably operate

resistorDerating.description: graph object to capture resistance changes with temperature
